body:
Comment 2: 
I'm seeing this at tip:

=== RUN TestCPUProfile
runtime: unknown argument frame size for runtime.asmcgocall

	/build/go.tip/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1818 +0xe3

	/build/go.tip/go/src/pkg/runtime/signal_amd64.c:51 +0x81
